education.title: Software Engineering

education.title: Research Intern
description: Developed a carbon-aware scheduling platform to calculate environmental impact of workloads running on servers.

description: Key Competencies: Data Structures and Algorithms, Real-World Project Development.

projects.title: Document Generation Platform
description: Built a platform to generate and customize documents in minutes.
Optimized rendering and export processes, reducing creation time by 30%.
Built using Vue (Nuxt.js).

projects.title: Cross-Platform Desktop App
description: Developed a desktop application with real-time chat and auto-update features.
Improved team communication and reduced downtime for feature rollouts by 40%.
Built using Electron(React) and Supabase.

projects.title: Amazon Advertising Management Tool
description: Delivered a platform to manage Amazon ad campaigns, profiles, and performance analytics.
Automated reporting & visualizations, saving clients 10+ hours/week of manual work.
Built using React (Next.js).

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed and maintained Django REST APIs with complex query handling and logic.
Built responsive components enhancing user experience and visual consistency.
Set up a CI/CD pipeline for the platform using GitHub Actions, Docker, and AWS.

experience.title: Front End Developer
description: Collaborated as a front-end developer on the Akil platform, connecting over 1300 youth with 30+ organizations.
Leveraged RTK Query to reduce page load time by 20% and improve user engagement.
Integrated a chatbot and text completion into the platform using OpenAI's API, enhancing user interaction and support.

experience.title: Lead Head of Remote Education
description: Trained over 100 students in diverse data structures and algorithms.
